string-array.item: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fnsentences_text_fts4 USING fts4(sentenceid INTEGER not null, annosetid INTEGER, frameid INTEGER, luid INTEGER, text); INSERT INTO fnsentences_text_fts4 SELECT sentenceid, annosetid, f.frameid, luid, text FROM fnsentences INNER JOIN fnannosets USING (sentenceid) LEFT JOIN fnframes AS f USING (frameid) LEFT JOIN fnlexunits AS l USING (luid) WHERE f.frameid IS NOT NULL;
